definition: (do sth) in passing/incidentally (while doing sth else)
to obey/to follow/to arrange/to make reasonable/along/favorable
band/belt/girdle/ribbon/tire/area/zone/region/CL:條|条[tiao2]/to wear/to carry/to take along/to bear (i.e. to have)/to lead/to bring/to look after/to raise

sentences.english: They manufacture low-cost flesh, with a side-dish of viruses to go.
sentences.chinese: 这些农场生产低成本的肉，顺带呈上病毒作为旁菜。

sentences.english: Did I mention that Gretchen is also in the slammer?
sentences.chinese: 顺带一说格雷琴也蹲在班房里哦。

sentences.english: You may also learn a thing or two about functional programming.
sentences.chinese: 你顺带还会学到一星半点函数式编程的知识。

sentences.english: This is my all-time favorite comic strip, incidentally.
sentences.chinese: 顺带一提，这也是我从小到大最喜欢的连环漫画。

sentences.english: The robot will be out of commission for awhile. It's being sent back to its manufacturer for repairs.
sentences.chinese: 顺带一提，机器人被送去返修了。

definition: easily/without trouble/while one is at it/in passing/handy
to appear to be/to seem as if
to be related/to entail/to involve/joint (liability etc)
to find the time to do sth
to seize an opportunity/to take advantage of situation
take-out (fast food)/(outer part of) tire/as well/besides/into the bargain/outer zone
to catch and hold on/to continue/to go on to do sth/to follow/to carry on/then/after that/subsequently/to proceed/to ensue/in turn/in one's turn
